name: Siren Head X Poppy Playtime
description:
SirenXMuggy Playtime Snow The Survival Horror Game is about two well known predators found in the snowy mountains
You as a Player , your car won't work for unknown reasons , but fortunately the police will help you by dropping 4 tools which is required for the car to be drivable , your mission is to escape the dangerous area but the two monsters will try to catch you , they'll call you and warn you everytime you hang up on them ...
of course including some other creatures that will make it harder for you sometimes...
You can defend yourself from all the enemies You'll easily find a functional weapon to start shooting targets in order to win...

Once you escape don't forget to rate the game
